body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Vincenzo's Benzos! My name is Jose Parker, and I'm here to assist you today. Could I start by getting your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jose, my name is Patricia Wright.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Patricia! How can I assist you with our vehicles today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in learning more about the financing options for a new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have a variety of financing options available. To get started, could I have your email address so I can send you some information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is patricia.wright@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Patricia. Also, to tailor the financing information specifically for you, could you provide me with your ZIP code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My ZIP code is nine eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you. I'll email you the information regarding our financing options based on your location. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Patricia, and I hope to see you soon at Vincenzo's Benzos!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jose Parker and the customer's name is Patricia Wright.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
